cab.content: Is document is' the property of His Britannic Majesty's Government).P.2107. OABIITO, -ALLEGED INCIDENT CONG" FNIHG THE "AfriCONA" . Nute^ by the Secretary. (Previous Paper C.P. 2098), The Admiralty have communicated a further telegram in regard to the S.S.ANC0NA, of which the following is a paraphrase :- From: C ornmander--in-Chief, Mediterranean, To: Admiralty. Date: 16th November, 1920. No. 592 Z. My 583%. Aiming riflo practice was being" carried out by one of H,M. ships near S.S. ANCOKA on October 20th. It is possible that Bolsheviks on shore mistook this for coercion of ANCONA. ^ **** (Set) M.P.A, Hankey. Secretary, Cabinet,2, Whitehall Gardens, F; November 17th 1920.
